about.title: About Pixelto
about.description: We are on a mission to democratize professional image editing with the power of Artificial Intelligence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Pixelto, we believe that creativity shouldn't be limited by technical skills. Our mission is to provide accessible, powerful, and intuitive tools that empower everyone to bring their visual ideas to life. Whether you're a professional designer or a casual creator, Pixelto is here to help you transform your imagination into reality.

faq.title: Pricing & Payment FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about plans, billing, and payments.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure payment processor Stripe. We also support Apple Pay and Google Pay where available.

q2.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period, and you won't be charged again.

q3.question: Can I try before I buy?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Free users receive daily credits that reset every 24 hours, allowing you to experience all our core AI editing features before deciding to upgrade. No credit card required to start.

q4.question: What happens when I run out of credits?
q4.answer: When you use all your monthly credits, you can either wait for your next billing cycle when credits reset, or upgrade to a higher plan for more credits. Free users receive daily credits that reset every 24 hours.

q5.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
q5.answer: Absolutely! You can change your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, the change takes effect at your next billing cycle.

q6.question: Is my payment information secure?
q6.answer: Yes, all payments are processed securely through Stripe, a PCI-DSS Level 1 certified payment processor. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.

freedom.title: Unlimited Creative Freedom
freedom.description: Change backgrounds, merge shots, and experiment with new styles in seconds. From anime-inspired art to cinematic realism, Pixelto delivers versatile results, perfect for game designers, marketers, and digital creators.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Pixelto AI.

q1.question: What is Pixelto AI and what can it do?
q1.answer: Pixelto AI is a powerful AI image editing platform that transforms your photos using natural language instructions. You can change backgrounds, apply artistic styles, remove objects, enhance lighting, and much more - all by simply describing what you want in plain English.

q2.question: How do I edit images with AI?
q2.answer: It's simple: 1) Upload your image (JPG or PNG), 2) Describe the changes you want in the text box (e.g., 'change background to sunset beach' or 'make it look like an oil painting'), 3) Click Generate and wait a few seconds for your edited image. You can then download the result or continue editing.

q3.question: What types of edits can the AI perform?
q3.answer: Our AI can handle a wide range of edits including: background replacement, style transfer (cartoon, anime, oil painting, etc.), object removal, lighting enhancement, color adjustments, day-to-night conversion, adding weather effects, and creative transformations like turning photos into sketches or cyberpunk scenes.

q4.question: Is Pixelto free to use?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier with daily credits that lets you experience our core AI editing features. For users who need more generations or higher resolution exports, we offer affordable Pro and Ultra plans with additional benefits.

q5.question: Can I use AI-generated images for commercial purposes?
q5.answer: Absolutely. Images you create with Pixelto can be used for personal and commercial projects. However, please avoid using prompts that include brand names, copyrighted characters, or real person likenesses. See our Terms of Service for full details.

q6.question: What image formats and sizes are supported?
q6.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats for upload. You can download your edited images in these formats as well. Free users can export at standard resolution, while Pro and Ultra subscribers get access to 4K high-resolution exports.
